title: Video games are the new concert venues
description:
How online games like Minecraft and Fortnite have become virtual concert venues.

Featuring
Julia Alexander (@loudmouthjulia)
Cherie Hu (@cheriehu42)

Links to resources discussed:
I Tried to crash the VIP area at American Football’s Minecraft concert

Host:
Arielle Duhaime-Ross (@adrs), host and lead reporter of Reset

About Recode by Vox:
Recode by Vox helps you understand how tech is changing the world — and changing us.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
